name: Jumping Spider
description:
In „Jumping Spider“ you play as a small spider girl on her endless quest of climbing a tower. You better make sure that you never stop climbing since the rotation of the tower will drag you into deadly traps and the platforms will disappear. Survive as long as you can!

Controls:
A/D - Move
W/S/Space – Jump
W/S/Space (Hold) – Charge Your Jump
ESC/P – Pause/Resume

Credits: „Jumping Spider“ created by Maciej Dębski, Jonas Rainero, Yuki Inoue and Fabian Schroth.

Programming by Maciej Dębski
Additional Programming by Fabian Schroth
Game Art by Jonas Rainero
Sound Design by Yuki Inoue | Noise Creator
